hero.description: High-traffic mobile platforssm serving 30M+ daily page views with real-time billing systems during FIFA World Cup 2006.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Handle massive traffic spikes during FIFA World Cup 2006, managing tracking and billing for Vodafone Live! mobile platform. The system needed to maintain 99.9% uptime while processing millions of real-time billing transactions during peak sporting events.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.content: Architected scalable infrastructure and real-time billing systems to handle unprecedented mobile traffic during major sporting events. Implemented load balancing, database optimization, and caching strategies to ensure consistent performance under extreme load.

results.title: Results & Impact
results.content: Successfully maintained 99.9% uptime during FIFA World Cup 2006, one of the highest-traffic events in mobile history at the time. The platform handled 30M+ daily page views while processing real-time billing transactions without degradation. The architecture established patterns still used in modern high-traffic systems.
